cause.description:
It's pretty simple if you agree with what he stands for then support him!
This is intended to be a breif overview of some of Mike Gravel's core belifs and campain messages if there is something you would like to see added please let me know.
Below are some websites if you so choose: http://www.gravel2008.us/ http://www.gravel2008.us/bio http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mike_Gravel_presidential_campaign,_2008 http://projects.washingtonpost.com/2008-presidential-candidates/mike-gravel/ http://www.selectsmart.com/president/2008/comparethem.html
1. Belives that politics and abortions don't mix. A women has the right to choose.
2. Fully supports stem-cell research
3. Fully supports same sex marriage
4. advocates the "Fair tax" and elimination of the IRS
5. believes we need to get out of iraq NOW.
6. Supports the legalizatoin of marijuana saying that this 'war on drugs' has made bad people out of innocent people mainly in the African American population
7. One of the first publice officals to oppose invasion of Iraq
8. Believes failures during Hurricane Katrina highlight structural changes that need to be made at the department
9. Global Warming needs to be an issue of national security
10. Belives in the right to bear arms but feels that there should be adequte training for gun owners
11. Education must be properly funded
12. Belives that NAFTA is unfair
13. Amnesty for illegal aliens they come to work dont deport them
14. Universal Healthcare
15. Favors abolition of the death penalty
16. Filibustered against the draft at the end of Vietnam
cause.name: Mike Gravel for President!
